name: Damask Patch
description: Used to craft insignias, which are used in armor crafting.

name: Recipe: Laranthir's Claymore
description: A recipe to make an ascended greatsword with Vigilant (+Power, +Toughness, +Concentration, and +Expertise) stats.

name: Aetherblade Recruitment Form
description:
Purchased from the Aetherblade Quartermaster in the Captain Mai Trin Boss fractal for Balls of Dark Energy. Dark Energy can be gained from salvaging ascended items using an Ascended Salvage Kit.
This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Spirit of the Perfected Daysword
description: Salvaged from the Perfected Daysword. Used to craft Dawn.

name: Oiled Orichalcum Pauldron Casing
description: Used to craft Orichalcum Shoulders.

name: Recipe: Wanderer's Pearl Needler
description: A recipe to make a Wanderer's Pearl Needler.

name: Expertise in Harpoon Gun Crafting
description:
Use this expertise to craft a second-tier precursor.
<c=@flavor>Most informative.<c>

name: Chest of Prey
description: Contains the Essence of Prey and recipes for first-tier Howl.

name: Recipe: Superior Rune of the Chronomancer
Recipe: Maklain's Musket
description: A recipe to make an ascended rifle with Minstrel's (+Toughness, +Healing, +Concentration, and +Vitality) stats.

name: Recipe: Vigilant Pearl Reaver
description: A recipe to make a Vigilant Pearl Reaver.

name: Recipe: Laranthir's Shoulderguard
description: A recipe to make ascended medium shoulders with Vigilant (+Power, +Toughness, +Concentration, and +Expertise) stats.

name: Recipe: Exquisite Ebony Jewel
description: Double-click to learn an Exotic Jewel Recipe.

name: Recipe: Commander's Draconic Legs
description: A recipe to make Commander's Draconic Legs.

name: Tricks and Tips for Advanced Dagger Crafting
description: Contains the book "Expertise in Dagger Crafting" and recipes for second-tier Spark.

name: Aerator
description: Used to craft Frenzy.

name: Box of Recipes: Rodgort's Flame (Second Tier)
description: Unlocks all recipes needed to craft Rodgort's Flame (Second Tier).

name: Oiled Ancient Staff Shaft
description: Used in Staff crafting.

name: Green Color Study
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Ghoul Backpack
description:
This will replace the appearance of one back slot item of any weight class and unlock the skin in your account wardrobe.

This back slot skin has no stats of its own.

name: Warrior's Cache
description: Rewarded for map completion on a Magus Falls map with a warrior.

name: Recipe: Trailblazer's Draconic Coat
description: A recipe to make a Trailblazer's Draconic Coat.

name: Recipe: Trailblazer's Pearl Carver
description: A recipe to make a Trailblazer's Pearl Carver.

name: Frenzy Vol. 1
description: Double-click to unlock the first collection in the journey to craft Rage, the precursor to the Legendary Harpoon Gun, Frenzy.

name: Recipe: Vigilant Emblazoned Coat
description: A recipe to make a Vigilant Emblazoned Coat.

name: Box of Recipes: The Lover
description: Unlocks all recipes needed to craft The Lover.

name: Recipe: Ruka's Claymore
description: A recipe to make an ascended greatsword with Wanderer's (+Power, +Vitality, +Concentration, and +Toughness) stats.

name: Elder Wood Pulp
description: Refined from planks.

name: Shard of Crystallized Resonance
description: Bring to the resonance technician at a guild hall to donate resonance.

name: Chest of Natural Protection
description: Contains the Essence of Natural Protection and a Recipe: Ravenswood Branch.

name: Glittering Axe Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other axe.

name: Recipe: Marauder Orichalcum Imbued Inscription
description: A recipe to make a Marauder Orichalcum Imbued Inscription.

name: Box of Recipes: Research
description: Unlocks all recipes needed to craft Research.

name: Terebinth's Calm
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Basic Boulder
description: Purchase to deposit this decoration into guild storage.

name: Jute Patch
description: Used to craft insignias, which are used in armor crafting.

name: Gummy Wurms

details.description:
+100 Healing
+70 Condition Damage
+10% Experience from Kills

description: <c=@flavor>Just as wriggly as the real thing.<c>

name: Purple Potato
description:
Ingredient
A rare potato found hidden in potato patches.
<c=@flavor>A rare and wonderfully complex potato.<c>

name: Thesis on Strength

details.description:
Gain 60 Power When Health above 90%
+10% Experience from Kills

description: Thesis: Double-click to set out a tome to share with anyone in the area. Stays active for 5 minutes.

name: Chest of the Ooze
description: Contains the Essence of the Ooze and recipes for completing The Colossus.

name: Gift of Gliding
description: In the mystic forge, combine a Gift of the Itzel, Gift of the Nuhoch, Gift of the Exalted, and Gift of Gliding to create the Gift of Insights.

name: Balanced Dagger Hilt
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Noxious Seed Pod
description: Double-click to open.

name: Frenzy Vol. 2
description: This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Attuned Royal Signet of Doric (Infused)
description: This item crackles with the infused energy of the Fractals of the Mists and is attuned to have a bonus agony infusion slot.

name: Exalted Key
description: Used to open Exalted chests in Auric Basin.<c=@flavor>Chests can contain armor, weapons, and recipes.</c>

name: Cliffside Challenge Mote
description:
Complete the Cliffside Challenge in the core tier (scale 21–50)! Beat the Archdiviner with an 80% reduction to all healing!
To activate challenge mode, speak with the challenge mote near the beginning of the fractal. A party vote is required to activate.

name: Resonating Sliver
description: Earned by completing guild missions.

name: Recipe: Pahua's Reaver
description: A recipe to make an ascended axe with Trailblazer's (+Toughness, +Condition Damage, +Expertise, +Vitality) stats.

name: Veteran Smokey the White-Tailed Gold Deer Loot Box
description: Veteran containers contain obsidian shards and a champion bag.

name: Hylek Loot Box
description:
Double-click to open.
Contains loot from creatures.
<c=@reminder>Affected by magic-find bonuses.</c>

name: Recipe: Pahua's Epaulets
description: A recipe to make ascended light shoulders with Trailblazer's (+Toughness, +Condition Damage, +Expertise, and +Vitality) stats.

name: Recipe: Trailblazer's Draconic Gauntlets
description: A recipe to make Trailblazer's Draconic Gauntlets.

name: Box of Recipes: The Ravenswood Branch
description: Unlocks all recipes needed to craft The Ravenswood Branch.

name: Malodorous Mucus
description: Double-click to combine the Volatile Spores, Bloodsucker Enzymes, Beetle Juice, Frothy Troll Saliva, Malodorous Mucus, and Salivary Stone in an Empty Hylek Flask to create the Concentrated Maguuma Bacteria.

name: Recipe: Ossa's Footwear
description: A recipe to make ascended light boots with Crusader (+Power, +Toughness, +Ferocity, and +Healing) stats.

name: Essence of the Bonfire
description: Use this essence to craft a first-tier precursor.

description: Used to craft Greatswords.

description: Use this to water your hidden garden in Mount Maelstrom.

description: Double-click to combine the venoms of a Canyon Spider Queen, Toxic Spider Queen, Enraged Spider Queen, and Gargantula in an Empty Hylek Flask to create the Arachnid Venom Decanter.

description: Used to craft inscriptions, which are used in weapon crafting.
